document_data.name: Loman
document_data.mainbody: '''Loman''' was an employee of the [[Gallaway Trade Depot]] in [[Targos]] under the supervision of [[Deirdre Gallaway]], or "Deird," as he called her, in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Loman was a brown-haired timid [[human]] man.
document_data.Possessions: Loman worse simple [[leather armor]], and carried a [[dagger]] as well as a [[wood]]en [[club]].
document_data.History: Loman worked at the Gallaway Trading Coaster's shop on top of the cliff overlooking the docks in Targos, moving crates and organizing the depot's inventory. He remained in Deirdre Gallaway's employ through the [[Legion of the Chimera]] crisis of the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
